column5: I'm reading about the controversy with having more than 120 minnows per person when crossing into Canada. Is there a limit on worms?? I'm aware of needing paper bedding for the worms. Anything else I need to know.
By "worms" are you talking about nightcrawlers??? Regardless - I don't believe there is a limit on either nightcrawlers OR worms. Just make sure they are NOT in dirt.
